titles.title: Restaurant Service Charge Fairness Act
Restaurant Service Charge Fairness Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit for a portion of employer social security taxes paid with respect to service charges paid by the employer to an employee in the form of wages, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary:
Restaurant Service Charge Fairness Act
This bill allows a tax credit for social security taxes paid with respect to service charges paid by an employer to an employee in the form of wages.
